title: 'Govt Facing Unprecedented Financial Stress Due to Pandemic': Finance Ministry Rejects MHA Proposal to Hike - News18
content: 'Govt Facing Unprecedented Financial Stress Due to Pandemic': Finance Ministry Rejects MHA Proposal to Hike  News18
description: Unprecedented financial stress due to the Covid-19 pandemic has forced the Union Finance Ministry to turn down a long-pending proposal of the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) to enhance monetary benefits to paramilitary soldiers awarded gallantry medals.
